SECTION_CONTENT:
General advice : First aider needs to protect himself. Move out of dangerous
: area. Immediately take off contaminated clothing and rinse
body with plenty of water.
Inhalation : Remove to fresh air. If breathing is difficult, give oxygen. Use
oxygen as required, provided a qualified operator is present.
Call a physician immediately.
Skin contact : Wash off immediately with plenty of water for at least 15
minutes. Take off contaminated clothing and shoes immediately.
Wash contaminated clothing before re-use. Call a physician
immediately.
Eye contact : Protect unharmed eye. Irrigate eyes for at least 15 minutes with
copious quantities of water, keeping eyelids apart and away
Ingestion : from eyeballs during irrigation. Call a physician immediately.
: Gently wipe or rinse the inside of the mouth with water. Do NOT
induce vomiting. Call a physician immediately.
Notes to physician
Most important
symptoms/effects, acute and
deleyed : No information available
Indication of immediate
medical attention and
special treatment needed, if
necessary : Health injuries may be delayed. Medical supervision for
minimum 48 hours.
